reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 153/98: EFW FACILITY AT 7656 BRAMALEA ROAD, BRAMPTON
reg_info.reg_name_text: EFW FACILITY AT 7656 BRAMALEA ROAD, BRAMPTON
reg_info.act_under: Environmental Assessment Act   Loi sur les évaluations environnementales

content.content: 1. Any enterprise or activity of changing the operation of or expanding the energy from waste facility at 7656 Bramalea Road in the City of Brampton, including all related steam or electrical energy transformation or transmission facilities, is defined as a major commercial or business enterprise or activity and is designated as an undertaking to which the Act applies. O. Reg. 153/98, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. Any enterprise or activity of changing the operation of or expanding the energy from waste facility at 7656 Bramalea Road in the City of Brampton, including all related steam or electrical energy transformation or transmission facilities, is defined as a major commercial or business enterprise or activity and is designated as an undertaking to which the Act applies. O. Reg. 153/98, s. 1.
